about_the_game:
Welcome to Trade Rivals - Goblin Age (Demo), your chance to take over medieval trade in a compact and exciting experience! In our demo version, playable with up to four friends, you can buy and sell items in three active product categories. Try to be the last, the best known or the richest trader.

Each time you play, you'll start with one of ten specially selected scenarios designed for the Demo. Each scenario offers unique pricing and stock options - find the most profitable items to sell!

At the end of each day, choose either a Curse or Blessing card to continue:

Curse Card: Secretly raise or lower the price of an item your friend sells.

Blessing card: Avoid taxes or rent. Get extra products or attract more customers.
Stingy, Generous, or regular customers will purchase items under different conditions and may grant or deduct additional reputation based on pricing and your current status. If your reputation reaches 5, you win the game; if it drops to 1, the lord closes your shop.

Keep an eye on what your rivals are buying - especially if they're stocking the same item as you. Supplies aren't easy to replenish. Remember to pay your rent and taxes at the end of each day. Otherwise, you risk running out of gold. If a particular item is cursed, its cost will increase, and you could go bankrupt on the spot if you don't have enough gold!

short_description: 4-player competitive trade game.Start the game with one of ten pricing scenarios.Make the best profit by buying and selling items in three product categories. Survive without going bankrupt by outbidding your rivals. Choose a Blessing or Curse card at the end of each day. Change your fate—or theirs.
